mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAVORITE_COMPANY (USER_ID, CORP_NAME, LOGO_URL, U_COMMENT) VALUES (#{userId}, #{corpName}, #{logoUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{u_comment})
mapper.select: SELECT FC_IDX AS fc_idx, USER_ID AS userId, CORP_NAME AS corpName, CREATED_AT AS createdAt, LOGO_URL AS logoUrl, U_COMMENT AS u_comment FROM FAVORITE_COMPANY WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM FAVORITE_COMPANY WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND CORP_NAME = #{corpName}
